name: The food Quest
description:
Collect 3 foods by defeating the turrets.

story: You were a sci-fi soldier who was on a spaceship to trade with the planet Forgicks. The ship crashed on an island and you were the only one who survived. You soon realize you are trapped in memory, and you must get all the foods to get out and get home to your planet Earth.

I used Unity 2019.4, and installed a microgame, and added on to that microgame(This is my first FPS game ever so that's why I used a microgame).
